_header: After this brightness and this leam / These herds come to Bethleham
Note: For the version in the ‘expanded’ Cycle see 550.
_description: Missa in mane natalis domini, in the Northern Homily Cycle — in couplets

BodAsh42.First Lines:
Efftir þis brightnes & þis lemeþir hirdmen come
                    to bedleeme…
BodAsh42.Last Lines:
…Als duse þe takenynge of mekenesffor agaynes fendes it
                    maste es
BodAsh42.Editions:
Thompson,  Anne B.,
                        ed.  
             The Northern Homily
                    Cycle.
         Kalamazoo, MI: Western Michigan University for TEAMS, 2008.

BodEngPoeta1.First Lines:
After þis brihtnes and þis leemþeos herdes come to
                    Bethleem…
BodEngPoeta1.Last Lines:
…As doþ þe tokne of Meknesffor aȝein fendes
                    most hit is
BodEngPoeta1.Facsimiles:
Doyle,  I. A.,
                        ed.  
             The Vernon Manuscript. A Facsimile of Bodleian Library, Oxford, MS Eng.
                poet.a.1,
          with an introduction by A. I. Doyle. Cambridge: D. S. Brewer, 1987. 
Scase,  Wendy,  and  Nick Kennedy, eds.  
             A facsimile edition of the Vernon manuscript: Oxford, Bodleian Library, MS. Eng. Poet. A. 1.
         Oxford: The Bodleian Library, 2011.

CULAdd8335.First Lines:
After þis brightnes and þis lemeÞise hirdes come to
                    Bedlehem…
CULAdd8335.Last Lines:
…Of mekenes to þat grete blisseÞat to make men
                    ordande is
CULAdd8335.Attributed Title:
Euangelium in secundam missa in die natalis domini secundum Lucam
                    (p. 31)

CULDd11.First Lines:
After þis brihtnes & þis lemthese herdis com to
                    bethlem…
CULDd11.Last Lines:
…as doþ þe tokne of mekenesfor a ȝen fendis
                    most it is
CULDd11.Note:
No break between this and preceding work, 6772, in this MS, nor between this and following
                    work, 5160.

CULGg531.First Lines:
Aftyr þis brygnes and þis lemeþare herdes come to
                    bethleem…
CULGg531.Last Lines:
…Als dos þe takenyng of meknesffore agayne þe fende
                    maste it es
CULGg531.Editions:
Small,  John,
                        ed.  
             English Metrical Homilies….
         Edinburgh: W. Paterson, 1862: 64-8.

BLAdd38010.First Lines:
Eftir this bryhtnes and þis lemeTher hirdes come to
                    bethleeme…
BLAdd38010.Last Lines:
…Als dose þe takenyng of meknesffor agayne þe fende
                    mast it es

HunHM129.First Lines:
Efftyr þis breyghnys and þis lemeþis herdys come to
                    bethleem…
HunHM129.Last Lines:
…As is þe toknynge of mekenysffor agaynys þe fendys
                    most hyt is
